command.name: insert-rule

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: index where rule should be inserted

command.abstract: insert a rule in a filter

description.p: This command will insert a new rule at the index specified as argument. The predicate and actions of the new rule can then be defined using commands matchbgp_router_peer_filter_add-rule_match and actionbgp_router_peer_filter_add-rule_action respectively.

see-also.p: The command add-rulebgp_router_peer_filter_add-rule can be used to append a rule.
